## VectorLayerAdapter.clearLayer() method

Remove layer data.

<b>Signature:</b>


## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  cb | (feature: Feature) =&gt; boolean | Delete only those objects that match the filter. |
